Description:
Detects an initiated network connection by a non browser process on the system to "azurewebsites.net". The latter was often used by threat actors as a malware hosting and exfiltration site.


Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Network Connection Initiated To AzureWebsites.NET By Non-Browser Process
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((initiated = 'true' and dst_host like '%azurewebsites.net') and  not ((process_path = 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe' or process_path = 'C:\Program Files\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe') or ((process_path like '%C:\Program Files (x86)\Safari\%' or process_path like '%C:\Program Files\Safari\%') and process_path like '%\safari.exe') or (process_path like '%C:\Program Files (x86)\PRTG Network Monitor\PRTG Probe.exe' or process_path like '%C:\Program Files\PRTG Network Monitor\PRTG Probe.exe') or ((process_path like 'C:\Program Files\Naver\Naver Whale\%' or process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Naver\Naver Whale\%') and process_path like '%\whale.exe') or (process_path = 'C:\Program Files\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe' or process_path = 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe') or ((process_path like 'C:\Program Files\Waterfox\%' or process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Waterfox\%') and process_path like '%\Waterfox.exe') or (process_path like '%\AppData\Local\Phoebe\%' and process_path like '%\Phoebe.exe') or (process_path like 'C:\Program Files\BraveSoftware\%' and process_path like '%\brave.exe') or (process_path like '%\AppData\Local\Flock\%' and process_path like '%\Flock.exe') or ((process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Avant Browser\%' or process_path like 'C:\Program Files\Avant Browser\%') and process_path like '%\avant.exe') or (process_path like '%\AppData\Local\Maxthon\%' and process_path like '%\maxthon.exe') or ((process_path like 'C:\Program Files\SeaMonkey\%' or process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\SeaMonkey\%') and process_path like '%\seamonkey.exe') or (process_path like '%\AppData\Local\Vivaldi\%' and process_path like '%\vivaldi.exe') or ((process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\QtWeb\%' or process_path like 'C:\Program Files\QtWeb\%') and process_path like '%\QtWeb.exe') or (process_path = 'C:\Program Files\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe' or process_path = 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe') or (process_path like 'C:\Users\%' and process_path like '%\AppData\Local\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe') or (process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft\EdgeWebView\Application\%' and process_path like '%\WindowsApps\MicrosoftEdge.exe' and (process_path = 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft\Edge\Application\msedge.exe' or process_path = 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft\Edge\Application\msedge.exe')) or (process_path like '%\AppData\Local\Discord\%' and process_path like '%\Discord.exe') or process_path = '' or ((process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft\EdgeCore\%' or process_path like 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft\EdgeCore\%') and (process_path like '%\msedge.exe' or process_path like '%\msedgewebview2.exe')) or ((process_path like 'C:\Program Files\SlimBrowser\%' or process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\SlimBrowser\%') and process_path like '%\slimbrowser.exe') or ((process_path like 'C:\Program Files\Falkon\%' or process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Falkon\%') and process_path like '%\falkon.exe') or (process_path like 'C:\Users\%' and process_path like '%\AppData\Local\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe') or ((process_path like '%C:\Program Files\Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection\%' or process_path like '%C:\Program Files\Windows Defender\%' or process_path like '%C:\ProgramData\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Platform\%') and (process_path like '%\MsMpEng.exe' or process_path like '%\MsSense.exe')) or (process_path like '%\AppData\Local\Programs\Opera\%' and process_path like '%\opera.exe') or process_path = 'null'))
